'''Taerna''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Taerna is a wood elf pirate who gambled on a sure thing one night - and wound up overestimating her luck. Now [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/), the proprietor of [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/), owns her until she pays off her debt. Until then, she works as a dancer for him. Problem is, Harker charges her for everything, from the uniform to the drinks, on top of the interest rate. As such, she started with a debt of 250 pires, paid it twice over, and is still in debt... for 700 pires.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/)
|none            = 
|other           = You can tip her {{cp2|1}} to help her pay off her debt
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/): As a wizard, she can provide the "special effects" required for [Calandra](/calandra/)'s upcoming show.

## Trivia

* Tipping her 1 pire 700 times will not pay off her debt.
